{{Lang|'''Yun Jin''' |zh=云堇|zh_rm=Yún Jǐn}} is a playable [[Geo]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is a prestigious dancer, singer, and brewer in [[Liyue]] who works at the [[Heyu Tea House]].
